value.title: Is MANY TO MANY, too many? | Power BI many to many relationships explained
value.excerpt: In this video we are going to go through Power BI Many to many relationships that were realeased in the POwer BI desktop July 2018 update.  This is what we will cover: 1. What are Many to many relationships 2. Why you should avoid them  3. How to avoid them  Questions, comments? Let me know in the comment

value.title: Schedule data downloads / exports in Power BI
value.excerpt: You can export data or download data out of Power BI in many different ways and depending on the source, you can schedule refresh those data dumps too.   In this video, I will give you one example on how to do that.  Other resources mentioned in this video: Export data with DAX Studio: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-Gfgnk6R0Qw

value.title: Trim/ remove spaces in a text column Power Query - Power BI Tips & Tricks #29
value.excerpt: In today's video I will show you how to trim or remove spaces (whitespaces) in Power Query / Power BI  Link to Ken Puls blog if you want to copy the function: http://www.excelguru.ca/blog/2015/10/08/clean-whitespace-in-powerquery/   Looking for a download file? Go to our Download Center: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: Convert data from HTML to Plain Text using Power Query for Power BI Table Visualization
value.excerpt: As we all know, Power BI table visualization does not support HTML generation. So, we need to convert our HTML text to Plain text.   With the help of Power Query function, we can easily remove HTML tags from the Text in Power Query. To implement that we need to use function HTML.table() in Power Query.

value.title: Power BI Tutorial: 4 Ways To Get Data
value.excerpt: In this Power BI tutorial, Adam looks at 4 ways to get data in Power BI. If you are new to Power BI, be sure to check out this Power BI Tutorial: 4 ways to get data.   Import (Excel)

value.title: The Power BI Smart Narrative visual is INSANE AMAZING!
value.excerpt: The smart narrative visual can help tell the story in your Power BI report. Justyna Lucznik joins us to explore the visual and to illustrate how you can generate text about your data.  Make sure you have the September 2020 version of Power BI Desktop, or later.  Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/visuals/power-bi-visualization-smart-narrative

value.title: DAX Measures: Filter Context Explained in Simple Terms using the I.C.A.N. Principle
value.excerpt: For Power BI DAX Measures, one of the hardest concepts to grasp is the Filter Context. Or is it? I explain the “Filter Context” using the 4-easy step approach of the I.C.A.N. Principle. ==  I. Incoming Filters ==  C. CALCULATE does it’s Magic! ==  A. Apply relationships (filters flow Across relationships)
